description:
Let there be light, power and great backcountry meals. Combining the new FlexLight 100 with the versatile and innovative BioLite stove, this camp-ready setup provides light for your cooking area. This version has been updated with a higher-capacity battery, providing longer-lasting power to your USB-powered gadgets. The BioLite CampStove 2+ burns twigs, pinecones, wood pellets, and other biomass.

  • LED dashboard lets you know the status of the fire, fan, and battery
  • Made of stainless steel, aluminum and plastic
  • Maximum continuous power output for USB is 3W at 5V. Peak is 3W at 5V (2A)
  • Charging times vary depending on the device and fire strength
  • Ports: micro-USB female (charging), type-A USB female (discharging)
  • 3200mAh battery requires initial charging via USB and recharging if the stove is not used for 6 months
  • Pot weight limit is 9kg
  • FlexLight features dimmer switch and ChromaReal LED technology
  • FlexLight uses 1.25 watts, CampStove will continue to charge its internal battery while the light is in use
  • Flexlight does not have a USB pass-through for charging
  • Includes CampStove 2+, FlexLight 100, stuff sack, instructions. USB cables for individual devices not included
name: BioLite CampStove 2+ Electricity Generating Wood Camp Stove
